wikipedia_page.main: Andrew Reilly (born 26 October 1985 in Luton) is a former professional footballer who played in The Football League for Wycombe Wanderers.Reilly was selected by the Scotland national under-21 football team in 2004.

response: Andy Reilly is the name of:
*Andy Reilly (footballer, born 1985), English-born Scottish player for Wycombe
*Andy Reilly (footballer, born 1986), Scottish player for Dundee and Arbroath
